## JsonEditorConverter.object() method

Gets a derived converter which fails if the resulting converted `JsonValue` is not a `JsonObject`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
object(): Converter<JsonObject, IJsonContext>;
```
**Returns:**

Converter&lt;JsonObject, [IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md)<!-- -->&gt;
